name: You Are Awake Now
description:
You're waking up at last.
What's everyone been up to while you were gone?
•··········•··········•
Use arrow keys to move and progress
(Or swipe on mobile)
•··········•··········•
Made with bitsy for the hibernation bitsy jam
Hacks by borksy; Tile conversion by pixsy
•··········•··········•
Most of these tiles are by Kenney
(Used under CC0 1.0 Universal)
•··········•··········•
